snippet: The legislation approved by the lower house of Parliament would fine customers of prostitutes, an issue that has caused heated debate.
abstract: French Parliament’s lower house takes first step in criminalizing the purchase of sex, approving a package of legislation to discourage prostitution.

byline.original: By MAÏA de la BAUME and ALISSA J. RUBIN

lead_paragraph: The legislation approved by the lower house of Parliament would fine customers of prostitutes, an issue that has caused heated debate.

headline.main: Lawmakers in France Move to Discourage Sex Trade
headline.print_headline: France: Vote Against Buying of Sex
